Hi Collab,

Thank you for your response, we have just a few more questions we hope
you can address.

The previous lease included a utilities addendum which stated that
water was $55. None of the other utilities had associated charges. We would
like to see the breakdown for the new charges, similar to the one just
mentioned. Which utilities are being  charged and how are you able to
distinguish among the usage for each unit?

In the addendum it says that "if Tenant individually or collectively
conserves utilities, any resulting reduction in the utility costs must be
passed on directly to the Tenant"? Is this the case and how are you able to
track this?

Another question that we have is regarding the 8% rent increase for the new
tenant. Our departing roommate, Amanda, had been paying $600 for her room.
Amanda's parents live in Berkeley and she spent her weekends at home, so we
decided to adjust our contributions accordingly. Although we each pay $775
per month through collab (we initially thought this is how we were required
to do it), in actuality we reimburse her every month. After all
considerations, the breakdown is:  $833.33 - $833.33 - $833.33 - $600 for a
combined total of $3100. We are requesting for the 8% increase to be
applied to the amount Amanda was actually paying.

Once we get these questions clarified, we will sign the lease.

Thanks,
Iris

*2427 Durant Ave, Berkeley, Unit 4 | Prameet Gupta (510)-229-7292*

I moved into my rental apartment last year (06/2022) with a spouse and a
kid when I started my grad school at UC Berkeley. I signed a 12-month lease
extension in March this year. However, we recently got to know that my wife
is pregnant and we will be expanding our family size to 4 members by the
end of this year or early next year. As such, it will become difficult for
my family to have 4 members in a studio apartment. My kids day care school
near our unit runs till July 2023 and after that we will be keen to vacate
our unit through following one of the approaches proposed below and to
enable us move to a bigger rental unit around North-west Berkeley.

In light of the already signed 12 month lease extension at same rent,
running till end of May 2024, I propose the landlord team the following
options to discuss how we can mutually agree on something to enable my
family move to a bigger unit in 08/2023:

(1) I live here till 07/2023 and the landlord signs a new lease starting
from 08/2023 for the new school year with a new tenant. Landlord team can
benefit from an increased market rate versus my rent which is the same as
last year. I get detached after the month end 07/2023.

(2) I continue my signed lease extension but sub-lease my unit to a new
tenant for the period 08/2023 to 05/2024. We can discuss how the landlord
can directly collect rental from the new sub-lessee directly. I move out on
08/2023 but settle my lease on 05/2024. Landlord will not get the market
rent increase under this case.

I am okay with any of the above proposals. But I am willing to discuss and
arrive at a mutually beneficial solution that suits my position and the
landlord's position as well. I look forward to hearing from the Collab
landlord team soon.


--
Regards,
Prameet Gupta

Hi all,

The electricity won't be covered. We increased the price bc it was supposed
to be $55/person/month rather than 55/unit/month previously due to our
clerical error. We made the mistake in the past so we won't ask for you to
pay it back, but going forward we are correcting that mistake. Hope you
understand. PG&E also raised their price significantly due to inflation &
geopolitical affairs, so we hope you understand.

A data point I can provide is that according to
https://www.energysage.com/local-data/electricity-cost/ca/, In California,
the average monthly electric bill for a residential customer is $210/month,
which is calculated by multiplying the average monthly consumption by the
average electric rate: 702 kWh * 30 ¢/kWh.

Your gas/water and other fees would still be covered.

Let me know if you have any other questions!

Hi Lydia,

Thank you for your email. All tenants in 3110 College Avenue will be
charged at a new passthrough amount in the new lease.

The utility fee that we charge is a passthrough fee, which covers the
actual costs of all the utilities paid by the landlord. This includes
water/sewer, electricity and gas for common areas, and garbage. The fee is
determined based on the current market rates for the utilities. We
understand that there's an increase in utilities, but please rest assured
that the landlord is not making any profit on the utility passthrough.

Should you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate
to reach out to us. We look forward to hearing back from your roommates
regarding the renewal.

Thanks,

Hi Anthony,

Thank you again for your interest in renewing your lease with us. The
utility fee that we charge is a passthrough fee, which covers the actual
costs of all the utilities paid by the landlord. This includes water,
electricity and gas for common areas, and garbage. The fee is determined
based on the current market rates for the utilities. We understand that
there's an increase in utilities, but please rest assured that the landlord
is not making any profit on the utility passthrough.

Should you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate
to reach out to us. We look forward to hearing back from your roommates
regarding the renewal.

Thanks,
Aileen

Aileen

>>>>
>>>> Dear Jane Wang,
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>> We hope this email finds you well. We are writing to provide you with
>>>> some important information regarding your unit and rent payments.
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>> If you have replied to our email to express your interest in renewing
>>>> your unit while your co-tenant(s) decided to move out, you have the option
>>>> of doing a Partial Renewal. In this case, you will be responsible for
>>>> finding your new co-tenant(s), and once you and your co-tenant(s) sign the
>>>> Subtenancy Lease and pay the security deposit, you will be rewarded with a
>>>> $200 referral bonus.
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>> Regarding your rent payment, please see the following:
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>> If you submitted the lease renewal Google form by March 4, 2023 and
>>>> selected the "You decide to renew your lease to May 31st, 2024, but your
>>>> co-tenant(s) decide not to renew", then your portion of rent will remain
>>>> the same as what you are currently paying.
>>>>
>>>> If we did not receive your Google form response by March 4, 2023 and
>>>> you moved in before January 1, 2022, your rent will be subject to 4.4%
>>>> increase, as per the regulations of the Berkeley Rent board.
>>>>
>>>> If we did not receive your Google form response by March 4 and you
>>>> moved in after January 1, 2022, your rent will remain the same as what you
>>>> are currently paying.
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>> Please note that your new co-tenant(s) will be charged the market rent,
>>>> which is 8% more than the rent paid by the co-tenant(s) who are leaving.
>>>> Therefore, if you choose to proceed with a Partial Renewal, kindly inform
>>>> your new co-tenant(s) about their rent amount and send us an email at
>>>> berkeley.ca.leasing@collabhome.io detailing the rent breakdown between
>>>> you and your current co-tenant(s). If there are multiple tenants in your
>>>> unit planning to do a Partial Renewal, please send us only one email.
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>> Additionally, please be aware that due to both continued high inflation
>>>> since the 2020 pandemic and undercharge in previous years, your monthly
>>>> utility pass-through fee will have to increase to match the actual costs.
>>>> We thank you for your understanding.
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>> Once you successfully find your new co-tenants, please ask them to
>>>> complete their rental application.
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>> If we neither receive qualified new co-tenants' completed rental
>>>> application, nor non-renewal notice in writing on or before March 31st,
>>>> 2023, all remaining tenants will be responsible for the entire rent of your
>>>> current unit for another 12 months starting from the date following the
>>>> termination date of your current lease.
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>
>>>>

Hi Annika,



Congratulations! Your application has been approved for 2423 Durant Ave Unit B, . We will send the lease agreement to all applicants and guarantors (if any) for e-signature via Dropbox Sign.

To secure the unit, the lease agreement must be signed and the move-in payment must be paid within 48 hours from the time you receive your lease agreement. Otherwise, the lease agreement becomes invalid, and Collab reserves its sole right to lease this unit to others without notification.

The move-in fund is a one-month security deposit, a first-month rent, and a first-month utility pass-through. After ALL applicants and co-signers sign the lease agreement, you will receive the payment instruction and an email to activate CollabHome Resident Center for online payment.

Please Note: For properties with no onsite parking, you may apply for street parking with the City of Berkeley.

Hi there,

Thank you for your interest in our property. We are thrilled to hear that
you are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property
manager, I am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you
with the necessary information to make an informed decision.

VR tour and photos are available on our website
<https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage> for you to view the apartment
virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of
the property and its features. (Scroll down and find the "Rental
Properties" section. Select the city you want to rent. Then, it will show
up all the available units we have.)


You can also schedule an in-person tour on our website
<https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage>. If you want to schedule an
in-person tour, please book 12 hours in advance. Once booked, our team will
confirm the time and meet you at the property. In-person tours are
currently in high demand so availability might be limited, so *we highly
recommend using our VR tour*.


If you are interested in applying, *our website
<https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage> has an application link for
your convenience**.* Please feel free to apply online and submit your
application. We encourage all potential renters to complete the application
process as soon as possible, as availability is limited.

Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look
forward to hearing from you and hosting you soon. Please contact us if you
have other questions at berkeley.ca.leasing@collabhome.io


Best,


---

Hi there,

Thank you for your interest in our property. We are thrilled to hear that
you are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property
manager, I am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you
with the necessary information to make an informed decision.

VR tour and photos are available on our website
<https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage> for you to view the apartment
virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of
the property and its features. (Scroll down and find the "Rental
Properties" section. Select the city you want to rent. Then, it will show
up all the available units we have.)


You can also schedule an in-person tour on our website
<https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage>. If you want to schedule an
in-person tour, please book 12 hours in advance. Once booked, our team will
confirm the time and meet you at the property. In-person tours are
currently in high demand so availability might be limited, so *we highly
recommend using our VR tour*.


If you are interested in applying, *our website
<https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage> has an application link for
your convenience**.* Please feel free to apply online and submit your
application. We encourage all potential renters to complete the application
process as soon as possible, as availability is limited.

Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look
forward to hearing from you and hosting you soon. Please contact us if you
have other questions at berkeley.ca.leasing@collabhome.io


Best,

Hi there,


Thank you for your interest in our property. I am thrilled to hear that you
are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property manager, I
am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you with the
necessary information to make an informed decision.


At this time, touring the property is unavailable as we are working with
the current tenant to figure out a touring schedule. If you are still
interested in scheduling a tour, feel free to reply to this email and our
management team will contact you as soon as the scheduling system is up and
running. We are hoping to set it up in approx. a month.


However, we have a VR tour and photos available on our website (
https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) for you to view the apartment
virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of
the property and its features. (Scroll down and find the "Rental
Properties" section. Select the city you want to rent. Then, it will show
up all the available units we have.)


Additionally, our website (https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) has
an application link for your convenience. Please feel free to apply online
and submit your application at any time. We encourage all potential renters
to complete the application process as soon as possible, as availability is
limited.


Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look
forward to hearing from you and answering any further questions you may
have.


Best regards,


Collab Property Management

Hi there,

Thank you for your interest in our property. We are thrilled to hear that
you are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property
manager, I am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you
with the necessary information to make an informed decision.

VR tour and photos are available on our website
<https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage> for you to view the apartment
virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of
the property and its features. (Scroll down and find the "Rental
Properties" section. Select the city you want to rent. Then, it will show
up all the available units we have.)


You can also schedule an in-person tour on our website
<https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage>. If you want to schedule an
in-person tour, please book 12 hours in advance. Once booked, our team will
confirm the time and meet you at the property. In-person tours are
currently in high demand so availability might be limited, so *we highly
recommend using our VR tour*.


If you are interested in applying, *our website
<https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage> has an application link for
your convenience**.* Please feel free to apply online and submit your
application. We encourage all potential renters to complete the application
process as soon as possible, as availability is limited.

Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look
forward to hearing from you and hosting you soon. Please contact us if you
have other questions at berkeley.ca.leasing@collabhome.io


Best,

Hi there,


Thank you for your interest in our property. I am thrilled to hear that you
are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property manager, I
am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you with the
necessary information to make an informed decision.


At this time, touring the property is unavailable as we are working with
the current tenant to figure out a touring schedule. If you are still
interested in scheduling a tour, feel free to reply to this email and our
management team will contact you as soon as the scheduling system is up and
running. We are hoping to set it up in approx. a month.


However, we have a VR tour and photos available on our website (
https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) for you to view the apartment
virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of
the property and its features. (Scroll down and find the "Rental
Properties" section. Select the city you want to rent. Then, it will show
up all the available units we have.)


Additionally, our website (https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) has
an application link for your convenience. Please feel free to apply online
and submit your application at any time. We encourage all potential renters
to complete the application process as soon as possible, as availability is
limited.


Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look
forward to hearing from you and answering any further questions you may
have.


Best regards,


Collab Property Management

---

Hi there,


Thank you for your interest in our property. I am thrilled to hear that you
are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property manager, I
am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you with the
necessary information to make an informed decision.


At this time, touring the property is unavailable as we are working with
the current tenant to figure out a touring schedule. If you are still
interested in scheduling a tour, feel free to reply to this email and our
management team will contact you as soon as the scheduling system is up and
running. We are hoping to set it up in approx. a month.


However, we have a VR tour and photos available on our website (
https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) for you to view the apartment
virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of
the property and its features. (Scroll down and find the "Rental
Properties" section. Select the city you want to rent. Then, it will show
up all the available units we have.)


Additionally, our website (https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) has
an application link for your convenience. Please feel free to apply online
and submit your application at any time. We encourage all potential renters
to complete the application process as soon as possible, as availability is
limited.


Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look
forward to hearing from you and answering any further questions you may
have.


Best regards,


Collab Property Management

Hi Zoe,

Thank you for your continued interest in leasing our units. We
really appreciate it, and we deeply apologize for any inconvenience caused
due to the mold issue in your unit.

Rest assured, CollabHome Management Team and our Community Pro on-site
Victoria White (your neighbor in unit #22) are working on this day in and
day out. We have already done the lab testing and our vendor is proposing a
permanent solution to us in a couple of days.

Let us write our guarantee to you here:
_______________________________________________
*CollabHome commits to take all reasonable measures to mitigate the current
mold problem and prevent any future mold re-growth. And in the case that
mold were to grow again in the future during the lease period, the owner
commits to resolve the issue as quickly as the condition allows and towards
the best outcome as we can.*
_______________________________________________

Hope the above guarantee can satisfy your needs.

*Just a kind reminder that if you would like to continue leasing our units,
you should formally declare your intention (submit relevant Google forms,
or email us) and sign your Lease Extension Agreement ASAP. Because the peak
leasing season in Berkeley area is coming up and tons of leasing inquiries
are flooding in every day.*

Thank you for your understanding and support.

---

Hi there,


Thank you for your interest in our property. I am thrilled to hear that you
are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property manager, I
am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you with the
necessary information to make an informed decision.


At this time, touring the property is unavailable as we are working with
the current tenant to figure out a touring schedule. If you are still
interested in scheduling a tour, feel free to reply to this email and our
management team will contact you as soon as the scheduling system is up and
running. We are hoping to set it up in approx. a month.


However, we have a VR tour and photos available on our website (
https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) for you to view the apartment
virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of
the property and its features. (Scroll down and find the "Rental
Properties" section. Select the city you want to rent. Then, it will show
up all the available units we have.)


Additionally, our website (https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) has
an application link for your convenience. Please feel free to apply online
and submit your application at any time. We encourage all potential renters
to complete the application process as soon as possible, as availability is
limited.


Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look
forward to hearing from you and answering any further questions you may
have.


Best regards,


Collab Property Management

are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property manager, I

to complete the application process as soon as possible, as availability is

Hi there,


Thank you for your interest in our property. I am thrilled to hear that you
are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property manager, I
am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you with the
necessary information to make an informed decision.


At this time, touring the property is unavailable as we are working with
the current tenant to figure out a touring schedule. If you are still
interested in scheduling a tour, feel free to reply to this email and our
management team will contact you as soon as the scheduling system is up and
running. We are hoping to set it up in approx. a month.


However, we have a VR tour and photos available on our website (
https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) for you to view the apartment
virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of
the property and its features. (Scroll down and find the "Rental
Properties" section. Select the city you want to rent. Then, it will show
up all the available units we have.)


Additionally, our website (https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) has
an application link for your convenience. Please feel free to apply online
and submit your application at any time. We encourage all potential renters
to complete the application process as soon as possible, as availability is
limited.


Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look
forward to hearing from you and answering any further questions you may
have.


Best regards,


Collab Property Management

Hi there,


Thank you for your interest in our property. I am thrilled to hear that you
are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property manager, I
am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you with the
necessary information to make an informed decision.


At this time, touring the property is unavailable as we are working with
the current tenant to figure out a touring schedule. If you are still
interested in scheduling a tour, feel free to reply to this email and our
management team will contact you as soon as the scheduling system is up and
running. We are hoping to set it up in approx. a month.


However, we have a VR tour and photos available on our website (
https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) for you to view the apartment
virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of
the property and its features. (Scroll down and find the "Rental
Properties" section. Select the city you want to rent. Then, it will show
up all the available units we have.)


Additionally, our website (https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) has
an application link for your convenience. Please feel free to apply online
and submit your application at any time. We encourage all potential renters
to complete the application process as soon as possible, as availability is
limited.


Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look
forward to hearing from you and answering any further questions you may
have.


Best regards,


Collab Property Management

Dear Collab Team,

On February 24th, 2023, I received an email from CollabHome instructing me
to renew my lease by emailing: berkeley.ca.leasing@collabhome.io. In the
email, it stated *"If you confirm that you will renew your lease by next
Friday, March 3rd, 2023, we will NOT increase your rent."* Given this email
and my intention to renew my lease, *I emailed
berkeley.ca.leasing@collabhome.io <berkeley.ca.leasing@collabhome.io> on
February 24th at 4:28PM,* well before the March 3rd deadline.

On February 28th, I received another email from CollabHome, instructing me
to complete a Google Form to confirm my rent renewal for Apartment 16.
Again, the instructions in the email stated* "If you submit the above
Google Form by this Saturday, March 4th, 2023, we will NOT increase your
rent." I completed and submitted the form on February 28th at
10:09PM.* Additionally,
there was *no* information on the google form stating the terms of a rent
increase. I also spoke to Aileen on Friday, March 10th and confirmed my
lease renewal situation with her. In this meeting, there was, again, no
clear indication that I will be receiving an increase in rent.

Yesterday, on March 14th at 11:29PM, Aileen messaged me on Discord, asking
me if I could confirm my lease renewal at *$3,060*. This was the *FIRST*
time I received a message about a rent increase.

My current rent price is* $2,750. *The new $3,060 rent price that Aileen
informed me of, is an *11.3% increase in my rent price. *I was not given
timely written notice of this sufficient increase in my rent. Based on my
rental experience in the past, I was always given 90 days notice of any
increases in rent. Additionally, it was clearly stated in numerous emails
that roommate switches were allowed and the Berkeley Rent Board also states
that Landlords must allow original tenants to replace roommates who have
left. This rent increase and lack of timely notice has caused distress to
me and my new co-tenant.

I am a good tenant, who respects neighbors and always pays rent on time. I
enjoy the CollabHome property and believe in its mission. Please let me
know how we can come to a solution for this issue and ensure Apartment 16
at 2521 Regent St is secured.

Best,
Jackie

Hi there,


Thank you for your interest in our property. I am thrilled to hear that you
are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property manager, I
am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you with the
necessary information to make an informed decision.


At this time, touring the property is unavailable as we are working with
the current tenant to figure out a touring schedule. If you are still
interested in scheduling a tour, feel free to reply to this email and our
management team will contact you as soon as the scheduling system is up and
running. We are hoping to set it up in approx. a month.


However, we have a VR tour and photos available on our website (
https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) for you to view the apartment
virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of
the property and its features. (Scroll down and find the "Rental
Properties" section. Select the city you want to rent. Then, it will show
up all the available units we have.)


Additionally, our website (https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) has
an application link for your convenience. Please feel free to apply online
and submit your application at any time. We encourage all potential renters
to complete the application process as soon as possible, as availability is
limited.


Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look
forward to hearing from you and answering any further questions you may
have.


Best regards,


Collab Property Management

Hi there,


Thank you for your interest in our property. I am thrilled to hear that you
are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property manager, I
am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you with the
necessary information to make an informed decision.


At this time, touring the property is unavailable as we are working with
the current tenant to figure out a touring schedule. If you are still
interested in scheduling a tour, feel free to reply to this email and our
management team will contact you as soon as the scheduling system is up and
running. We are hoping to set it up in approx. a month.


However, we have a VR tour and photos available on our website (
https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) for you to view the apartment
virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of
the property and its features. (Scroll down and find the "Rental
Properties" section. Select the city you want to rent. Then, it will show
up all the available units we have.)


Additionally, our website (https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) has
an application link for your convenience. Please feel free to apply online
and submit your application at any time. We encourage all potential renters
to complete the application process on our website as soon as possible, as
availability is limited (please apply directly on our website as we don’t
take applications from any third parties)


Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look
forward to hearing from you and answering any further questions you may
have.


Best regards,


Collab Property Management

Hi there,


Thank you for your interest in our property. I am thrilled to hear that you
are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property manager, I
am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you with the
necessary information to make an informed decision.


At this time, touring the property is unavailable as we are working with
the current tenant to figure out a touring schedule. If you are still
interested in scheduling a tour, feel free to reply to this email and our
management team will contact you as soon as the scheduling system is up and
running. We are hoping to set it up in approx. a month.


However, we have a VR tour and photos available on our website (
https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) for you to view the apartment
virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of
the property and its features. (Scroll down and find the "Rental
Properties" section. Select the city you want to rent. Then, it will show
up all the available units we have.)


Additionally, our website (https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) has
an application link for your convenience. Please feel free to apply online
and submit your application at any time. We encourage all potential renters
to complete the application process on our website as soon as possible, as
availability is limited (please apply directly on our website as we don’t
take applications from any third parties)


Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look
forward to hearing from you and answering any further questions you may
have.


Best regards,


Collab Property Management

Thank you for your interest in our property. I am thrilled to hear that you are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property manager, I am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you with the necessary information to make an informed decision.




At this time, touring the property is unavailable as we are working with the current tenant to figure out a touring schedule. If you are still interested in scheduling a tour, feel free to reply to this email and our management team will contact you as soon as the scheduling system is up and running. We are hoping to set it up in approx. a month.




However, we have a VR tour and photos available on our website (https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) for you to view the apartment virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of the property and its features. (Scroll down and find the "Rental Properties" section. Select the city you want to rent. Additionally, our website (https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) has an application link for your convenience. Please feel free to apply online and submit your application at any time. We encourage all potential renters to complete the application process on our website as soon as possible, as availability is limited (please apply directly on our website as we don’t take applications from any third parties)




Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look forward to hearing from you and answering any further questions you may have.




Best regards,




Collab Property Management

Hi there,


Thank you for your interest in our property. I am thrilled to hear that you
are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property manager, I
am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you with the
necessary information to make an informed decision.


At this time, touring the property is unavailable as we are working with
the current tenant to figure out a touring schedule. If you are still
interested in scheduling a tour, feel free to reply to this email and our
management team will contact you as soon as the scheduling system is up and
running. We are hoping to set it up in approx. a month.


However, we have a VR tour and photos available on our website (
https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) for you to view the apartment
virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of
the property and its features. (Scroll down and find the "Rental
Properties" section. Select the city you want to rent. Then, it will show
up all the available units we have.)


Additionally, our website (https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) has
an application link for your convenience. Please feel free to apply online
and submit your application at any time. We encourage all potential renters
to complete the application process as soon as possible, as availability is
limited.


Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look
forward to hearing from you and answering any further questions you may
have.


Best regards,


Collab Property Management

Hi there,


Thank you for your interest in our property. I am thrilled to hear that you
are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property manager, I
am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you with the
necessary information to make an informed decision.


At this time, touring the property is unavailable as we are working with
the current tenant to figure out a touring schedule. If you are still
interested in scheduling a tour, feel free to reply to this email and our
management team will contact you as soon as the scheduling system is up and
running. We are hoping to set it up in approx. a month.


However, we have a VR tour and photos available on our website (
https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) for you to view the apartment
virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of
the property and its features. (Scroll down and find the "Rental
Properties" section. Select the city you want to rent. Then, it will show
up all the available units we have.)


Additionally, our website (https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) has
an application link for your convenience. Please feel free to apply online
and submit your application at any time. We encourage all potential renters
to complete the application process on our website as soon as possible, as
availability is limited (please apply directly on our website as we don’t
take applications from any third parties)


Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look
forward to hearing from you and answering any further questions you may
have.


Best regards,


Collab Property Management

are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property manager, I
am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you with the
necessary information to make an informed decision.

interested in scheduling a tour, feel free to reply to this email and our

running. We are hoping to set it up in approx. a month.

an application link for your convenience. Please feel free to apply online
and submit your application at any time. We encourage all potential renters
to complete the application process as soon as possible, as availability is
limited.


Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look
forward to hearing from you and answering any further questions you may
have.


Best regards,


Collab Property Management

Hi there,


Thank you for your interest in our property. I am thrilled to hear that you 
are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property manager, I 
am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you with the 
necessary information to make an informed decision.


At this time, touring the property is unavailable as we are working with 
the current tenant to figure out a touring schedule. If you are still 
interested in scheduling a tour, feel free to reply to this email and our 
management team will contact you as soon as the scheduling system is up and 
running. We are hoping to set it up in approx. a month.


However, we have a VR tour and photos available on our website (
https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) for you to view the apartment 
virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of 
the property and its features. (Scroll down and find the "Rental 
Properties" section. Select the city you want to rent. Then, it will show 
up all the available units we have.)


Additionally, our website (https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) has 
an application link for your convenience. Please feel free to apply online 
and submit your application at any time. We encourage all potential renters 
to complete the application process as soon as possible, as availability is 
limited.


Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look 
forward to hearing from you and answering any further questions you may 
have.


Best regards,


Collab Property Management

Hi there,


Thank you for your interest in our property. I am thrilled to hear that you
are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property manager, I
am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you with the
necessary information to make an informed decision.


At this time, touring the property is unavailable as we are working with
the current tenant to figure out a touring schedule. If you are still
interested in scheduling a tour, feel free to reply to this email and our
management team will contact you as soon as the scheduling system is up and
running. We are hoping to set it up in approx. a month.


However, we have a VR tour and photos available on our website (
https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) for you to view the apartment
virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of
the property and its features. (Scroll down and find the "Rental
Properties" section. Select the city you want to rent. Then, it will show
up all the available units we have.)


Additionally, our website (https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) has
an application link for your convenience. Please feel free to apply online
and submit your application at any time. We encourage all potential renters
to complete the application process as soon as possible, as availability is
limited.


Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look
forward to hearing from you and answering any further questions you may
have.


Best regards,


Collab Property Management

Hi there,


Thank you for your interest in our property. I am thrilled to hear that you
are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property manager, I
am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you with the
necessary information to make an informed decision.

the current tenant to figure out a touring schedule. If you are still
interested in scheduling a tour, feel free to reply to this email and our
management team will contact you as soon as the scheduling system is up and
running. We are hoping to set it up in approx. a month.

virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of

up all the available units we have.)

an application link for your convenience. Please feel free to apply online
and submit your application at any time. We encourage all potential renters
to complete the application process as soon as possible, as availability is
limited.


Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look
forward to hearing from you and answering any further questions you may
have.


Best regards,


Collab Property Management

Hi there,

Thank you for your interest in our property. I am thrilled to hear that you
are interested in renting one of our apartments. As the property manager, I
am happy to answer any questions you may have and provide you with the
necessary information to make an informed decision.

At this time, touring the property is unavailable as we are working with
the current tenant to figure out a touring schedule. If you are still
interested in scheduling a tour, feel free to reply to this email and our
management team will contact you as soon as the scheduling system is up and
running. We are hoping to set it up in approx. a month.

However, we have a VR tour and photos available on our website (
https://www.collabhome.io/newRentHomePage) for you to view the apartment
virtually. These resources should give you a comprehensive understanding of
the property and its features. (Scroll down and find the "Rental
Properties" section. Select the city you want to rent. Then, it will show
up all the available units we have.)

Additionally, our website has an application link for your convenience.
Please feel free to apply online and submit your application at any time.
We encourage all potential renters to complete the application process as
soon as possible, as availability is limited.

Thank you for your understanding and interest in our property. We look
forward to hearing from you and answering any further questions you may
have.

Best regards,

Collab Property Management
